## Conditionals

```{r}
test_sign <- function(x) {
  if (x > 0) {
    "x is positif"
  } else if (x < 0) {
    "x is negatif"
  } else {
    "x is equal to zero"
  }
}
```

```{r}
test_sign(3)
test_sign(-2)
test_sign(0)
```

## Loops

```{r}
for (i in 1:10) {
  print(i)
}
```

Notice that here we need to use the `print()` function.
